Description:
LIVE IN OR INVEST
Certain to spark the interest from new comers to the property market, investors and buyers wanting minimal property maintenance, this three bedroom home has all the right elements that make it ideal.
A location boasting easy access to Croydon Main Street, Eastfield shops, Eastfield Park and a short walk or commute to schools that include Tintern, the home itself is equally appealing.
Beginning with a generous front yard with street appeal, the interior is lined with functional hardwood floors, a spotless bathroom, a lounge room with a gas log fire, kitchen/meals zone, as well as reverse cycle heating/cooling.
Whether you're looking to owner occupy the residence or think of it as a business opportunity for investment purposes (currently leased at $325 p/w on a month to month basis), there's potential at either end of the scale.
Features: Single garage
Insights: 9 Helen Avenue, CROYDON SOUTH VIC 3136 was last sold in 2013 and 48 other 3 bedroom house in CROYDON SOUTH have recently been sold.

Description:
Quiet, Private & 'As New'!
Set back from the road for ultimate peace and privacy, this 3 years young abode is just like a new home, only better!
On entering, immediate attention is drawn to the warm and relaxed feel, showcasing a neutral colour scheme and enhanced by rich forest tones from the floating floor, leading down a long passage to a sun drenched open plan living area comprising a spacious lounge, meals area leading out to a covered decking and a fabulous contemporary kitchen with stainless steel appliances; electric oven, gas stove and dishwasher, as well as a breakfast bar.
The master bedroom is well proportioned and entails a walk-in robe and full ensuite whilst the additional generous sized bedroom features double built-in robes and convenient access to the modern bathroom comprising a separate bath and shower.
Adding a measure of comfort, lifestyle enhancing extras include: clever Euro laundry, gas ducted heating, split system air-conditioning, down lights, remote double garage with internal and pedestrian access to rear, with a pathway to a low maintenance courtyard with ample room for children's play equipment.
Whether you're a retiree, first-home buyer, empty nester or investor, you will have the very best of everything at your door step, including a bus stop right out front, Tinternvale Primary School, Tintern Girls Grammar School, Eastfield Shopping Centre and EastLink only several minutes away.
A beautiful home with everything you could need or want - the only thing missing is you. An immediate inspection is a must!
Ash Thompson : 0401 205 320
Insights: 3/178 Bayswater Road, CROYDON SOUTH VIC 3136 was last sold in 2013.

Description:
One out of the Box!
#### OFFERS CLOSE 5pm Tuesday November 12th ####
Just five years young this magnificent unit will have you sold from the moment of entry. Tucked neatly away in a beautiful tree lined street youll enjoy quiet quality living for years to come. A brilliant opportunity for single parents, young couples and investors! The features are many, they include;
* Open Kitchen/Meals
* Large Living
* North Facing
* Private rear yard with deck
Brilliantly located close to schools and a short walk to the Eastfield Shops on Bayswater Rd. With the vendor keen to sell its first in best dressed!

Description:
Under Offer/Under Contract
Investors call off the search - this is it! Here is an exceptional opportunity to secure a property that promises to be a low stress, low maintenance addition to your property portfolio. Situated in a quiet leafy court, this well presented brick veneer home features plenty of street appeal and a warm neutral decor. The inviting interior comprises lounge with pretty bay window that offers a lovely garden aspect, open-plan kitchen/meals/living zone with gas cooking and good storage, 3 robed bedrooms - the master bedroom with direct access to a neat 2-way bathroom, and laundry with garden access. A spacious light-filled family room leads to the covered patio and level garden with lush lawn for backyard cricket and mature trees for afternoon shade. Additional features include ducted heating, secure garage, and garden shed. A short walk to school and parklands, with easy access to train, bus, Eastlink and Eastland Shopping Centre - inspect today, invest tomorrow!

Description:
It’s Time
This classic 1970s Graeme Gunn Merchant Builders designed home is in remarkably authentic and original condition. All the features which distinguish this iconic builder abound – old Hawthorn bricks, vaulted ceilings, open fire and, of course, style, style, style! Lounge and separate dining, original kitchen and meals, four beautifully large bedrooms, two bathrooms etc. The house is nestled in a superb end of court locality directly abutting and overlooking the Tintern School’s farm. Setting off this lovely block of over 900 square metres (approx) are mature native gardens and unimpeded views to the Dandenongs. It’s time to act.
Photo ID required at all inspections.

Address: 45-47 LONG VIEW ROAD CROYDON SOUTH VIC 3136
Description:
Big Family Dream - Tintern Precinct Qtr Acre Plus
Families and Tradies, this beautifully updated 2-storey family sanctuary offers you space, style and 3-car accommodation on approx. 1209 sqm "BORDERING RINGWOOD EAST". It's set in the coveted Tintern precinct, a short walk from Tinternvale Primary and Tintern Grammar. The freshly painted, light-filled interior feels good with its brand new carpets and views of the Dandenongs. Spacious and practical, discover 4 bedrooms (robed) and a smart family bathroom. Upstairs is a parent's dream - a huge master suite featuring parent's retreat, spa bath ensuite and WIR. An open study area is also upstairs. Three zoned living areas (garden access) and a gourmet kitchen showcasing new s/s 900mm Euro oven and s/s dishwasher will make life easy. Enjoy the views from the big lounge/dining room, or unwind in the family/meals room. The large rumpus room (high angled ceilings) has French doors to a vast covered entertainer's deck; for seamless indoor/outdoor living. You'll also love the child-friendly gardens, big workshop/man cave, off street parking, remote double garage and secure carport. Extras: ducted heating, cooling, shed, excellent storage and 5,000-litres water storage. Walk to bus, schools, Eastfield Mall, kinder and reserves; close to station. "VENDOR SAYS SELL"!!

Description:
Nest or invest in potential and location!
In an elevated, north-oriented position overlooking Cheong Sanctuary, this charming 2 bedroom home is a fantastic 1st house on a low-maintenance allotment with front and rear gardens. 2 bedrooms with polished floors and built-in wardrobes share the spacious, updated family bathroom (bath, toilet and shower). Accessed from a covered entertaining deck, the fenced backyard has a shed and access to the tandem carport and may suit extension of the home (STCA). The north-facing lounge room enjoys bushland views, continuing to the updated kitchen with a dishwasher, meals area and laundry access. Highlights: gas heating, inverter split system, polished floors and decorative cornices. This gorgeous home is close to Cheong Park, Tintern Grammar, Tinternvale Primary School and Ringwood East station and shopping strip, plus Eastfield Mall and Maroondah Hospital.
* Polished floors
* Reserve views
* North-facing
* Low-maintenance block
* Potential extension (STCA)
* Nearby shops, schools and station
Terms: 10% deposit, balance 30/60/90 days
Land: 483 sq m approx.

Description:
Love the Location, Relish the Serenity
There's no denying the grand nature of this stately home, perched majestically on its elevated allotment in the coveted Tintern precinct to present a compelling case for buyers searching for family living of large proportions.
Warm neutral tones combine abundant natural light to create a positive and inviting ambience from the very outset, adding a visual element that reinforces the home's aesthetic appeal and freedom it gives to the future occupant to move in and decorate as they please.
Space and height are achieved in superb style with soaring Cathedral ceilings and expansive living areas that offer a fantastic mix of formal and informal options.
A radiant lounge on entry is warmed by a Jetmaster open fireplace and capitalises on its elevated nature by capturing the scenic outlook on offer, while cooks of any level will appreciate the stylish kitchen defined by its abundant bench space, quality stainless steel appliances and easy-to-clean glass splashback.
Glass sliding doors promote the integration between the light-filled family living and sheltered outdoor area, decorated with blossoming wisteria to offer a wonderful escape from the daily grind, as well as a superb entertaining space during the warmer months. The kids of the household will also appreciate running around the large backyard, home to mature gardens and a manicured lawn.
Successful zoning sees the generous-sized bedrooms located on a separate section of the home, each fitted with built-in robes and serviced by an updated family bathroom (floor-to-ceiling tiling, modern vanity and corner spa bath). A large Master bedroom also spoils parents with its updated ensuite.
Offering modern comfort, the home also enjoys evaporative cooling, gas ducted heating and ducted vacuum.
Enjoy morning strolls through any of the nearby parks, and as a future resident, you'll appreciate the walking distance access to Tintern Schools and very close proximity to Ringwood East train station, Eastland Shopping Centre and Eastlink.
Insights: 32 ANDREW CRESCENT, CROYDON SOUTH VIC 3136 was last sold in 2013 and 48 other 3 bedroom house in CROYDON SOUTH have recently been sold.

Description:
THE ART OF MODERN LIVING
Only two years young, this beautifully designed and built home will tap into your every emotion.
Not only is it refreshingly young with all the mod cons you could desire, it has a sense of family focus, with a strategic balance of style, sophistication, tranquility and simplicity.
Whether or not the red painted door is deliberate to encourage luck and prosperity, one thing is for sure, the new owners of this home will be very, very happy here. Either way it's a lovely welcoming into this split level home, with high ceilings and stunning Black-Butt timber floors taking immediate focus.
The splash of red is again displayed in the kitchen, which also has a movable island bench, quality stainless steel appliances, Caesar stone bench tops and a very well sorted pantry. Being able to stay within close range of guests in the dining and living area, or to be near children playing outside in the garden or on the Merbau deck, the thoughtful consideration of the design is obvious.
The use of Caesar stone flows into the powder room, laundry and up into the family bathroom upstairs, where you'll also find another two bedrooms with plenty of built in robes space, as well as a teen/children's retreat, keeping adults to their domain downstairs, complete with their own en suite and walk in robe.
Features include ducted heating, reverse cycle cooling, ducted vacuum, 5000 litre water tank and a paneled double garage with internal access.
Located close to transport, shops and schools.
Insights: 48 other 3 bedroom house in CROYDON SOUTH have recently been sold.

Description:
Auction this Sat at 12.30pm Unless Sold Prior
Contemporary in design and incredibly low maintenance, this stylishly fitted character weatherboard dwelling is the perfect first home or downsizing option. Showcasing three comfortably sized beds and open plan living and dining that beautifully extends out to a covered patio, it combines modern features with hints of period detailing including an open fire place and claw foot bath. Conveniently located just a short walk from local shops, it also features:
*Polished floorboards; SS appliances
*Freshly painted & new carpet
*GDH & AC unit; New energy efficient lighting
*Double carport; Shed; Low maintenance gardens
*Opposite walking track, short walk to Eastfield shops
*Close to Ringwood East station, Cheong Park & schools

Description:
DON'T YOU JUST LOVE TO BE SURPRISED!?
A pleasant surprise waits at the end of this semi-private lane. Almost taking full ownership of the street, this extensive property provides more than what you probably bargained for.
Who'd think that a home in this estate would offer so much usable land around it, providing exceptional parking, entertaining and play space for the whole family. Sitting on approximately 1011m2 (approx.), this is a place where one could find solitude everyday without having to go away from the home to find entertainment, and when inside, it provides the perfect interior to raise your family.
Step into an open plan living, dining and kitchen area, all of which take pride in the views into the front and rear gardens, as well as a close connection to the large outdoor entertaining pergola and spa. There are three bedrooms with robes and two bathrooms to compliment.
A gas wood fire sets the scene in the cooler months, with the addition of ducted heating and split system cooling to make sure the Melbourne weather is kept at bay throughout the seasons.
Highlights: Secured car accommodation for two cars, a large workshop, garden/storage shed and a water tank.

Description:
READY FOR ITS NEXT CHAPTER
Here's your chance to enjoy year round convenient living in this comfortable three bedroom home, positioned within easy reach to Eastfield shopping precinct, bus links and just a short commute to Croydon Main street shopping strip.
Full of potential, this place is perfect for the independent downsizer or retiree, or for first home buyers wanting a blank canvas to renovate, as well being the ideal low maintenance investment property.
Inside offers a lounge room with air conditioning, a spotless kitchen and meals area with gas cooking facilities and a dishwasher, zoned bedrooms with ceiling fans and carpet and a bathroom to compliment.
Ducted heating, a secured double carport with access to the back yard, a private covered pergola and a desirable flat garden with plenty of lawn out front complete this promising, tightly held property.

Description:
First Home; Superb Investment
With Merrindale Shops, buses and schools at your doorstep, this spacious family home is an ideal investment in the future. Positioned on approximately 867sqm with a circular driveway, wide street frontage and huge backyard the potential is vast. Inside youll discover the warmth of timber floors, a neat kitchen, large lounge room and 3 bedrooms with built-in robes. The Eastfield Rd location also reveals its convenience to Tintern Girls Grammar, Arndale Shopping Centre and Croydon shops and station.
* gas ducted heating, ceiling fans
* undercover deck overlooking the rear yard
* Strong return on investment
* Close to top schools, many large parks and reserves

Description:
Picture-Perfect Appeal
With its beautiful presentation and seamless blend of indoor/outdoor living, this smart brick veneer family retreat is the one to see. It's ideally located in the Gateway Estate and is sure to attract Young Families, Investors or Downsizers dreaming of effortless living. Colonial-style bay windows, a front verandah and a gorgeous refreshed landscaped garden exude instant street appeal. The sun-kissed interior feels good too; it's styled with brand new carpets, fresh neutral tones and modern window furnishings. Enjoy a spacious and practical design featuring 3 double bedrooms (robed) and a family bathroom. The privately zoned master suite boasts ensuite and WIR. Two zoned living areas and a gourmet country-style kitchen showcasing s/s Euro appliances, servery window and island bar will make life a breeze. Relax or entertain in style in the large formal lounge/dining room. Open the French doors from here and you can unwind with friends on the huge roofed entertainer's deck (lighting, ceiling fan). A spacious family/meals room is warmed by a gas wood fire heater and also has deck access. Children and parents alike will love the tranquillity of the useable landscaped backyard, which has an undercover area for a trailer. Appointments: split system air-conditioning, gas wood fire heater, remote double garage (rear access for a trailer), external blinds and shed. This is a premium location, close to bus, Merrindale shops, schools, parks and EastLink. You'll need to be quick.
Donna Walpole : 0421 997 827

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT
A quiet cul de sac location in the popular Gateway Estate is where you'll discover this flowing single-level four-bedroom home that's tailor-made for the growing family or those looking to enter the market in style!
Two radiant living areas exude contemporary appeal as a result of their open, spacious nature and warm contemporary colour scheme. A curved bay window bathes the large lounge in natural light, while an island bench accentuates the functionality of the well-appointed kitchen that overlooks the family living featuring indoor-outdoor options.
A large backyard is a play haven for kids; sheltered alfresco with gas mains BBQ plus an entertaining barn is the ultimate man cave, delivering your very own pub experience with its timber paling walls and bar!
Bedrooms are of a generous nature, and for parents, a large Master bedroom comes complete with walk-in robe and modern ensuite. The combination of gas ducted heating with split-system heating and cooling also ensures you're kept cool in summer and warm and snug in winter. Adding to the appeal, parkland, schools, shops and Eastlink are only minutes away.

Description:
COMFORTABLE & METICULOUSLY MAINTAINED FAMILY HOME!
This spacious & solid, 2 storey, 3 bedroom family home has been lovingly & meticulously maintained by its original owner for over 40 years. Featuring a formal lounge & dining room as well as an open plan kitchen/meals area & a further living room, this home has room for all to relax & entertain. Upstairs are 3 spacious bedrooms with built in robes & the sun drenched master bedroom with 3 sets of double robes & elevated views. Downstairs the timber kitchen features gas cooking & a walk in pantry that utilises the space under the stairs. The formal lounge sits adjacent to the sunken dining room, both of which have lovely garden views; the lounge with glass door access to the spacious undercover outdoor entertaining areas. Outside there are meandering paths, magnificent established cottage gardens that bloom all year round, 2 garden sheds, 2 entertaining areas & 2 carports, all located on almost a quarter of an acre on a quiet service road just a short walk to the local shops.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
Build Your Dream Home!
Make a decision that will change your future for the better.
Set in a leafy locale, back from the road for complete privacy, this prime, near level, 415m2 (approx) parcel of land, which has all services already connected, could be your own slice of the Australian dream.
Choose whether you will build your own design (subject to council approval) or why not take advantage of utilising the approved plans and indulge in two levels of spacious living, featuring open plan living area incorporating the lounge, dining and kitchen, second living area (upstairs), three robed bedrooms including a master with walk-in robe and full en-suite, three-way access to double garage including internal entry, abundant storage, family-sized bathroom, powder room and private courtyard.
Only 27 km's (approx) east of Melbourne CBD, Croydon has 38 parks covering nearly 17% of the total area, 10 schools, several childcare centres and you'll be close to Main Street Croydon - the thriving hub with over 187 traders from restaurants, cafes, cinema and of course the famous Croydon market close by, as well as fast access to EastLink.
There is no better place to lay down your roots - enquire now!
Geoff Thompson

Description:
Beautifully Presented and Ready to Enjoy
Stylishly renovated and beautifully presented, this lovely home boasts a sought after location simply perfect for the young or growing family.
You'll first notice the appeal of the delightful front garden and the classic street presence. Set on a lovely garden block of 870m2 (approx), step inside and discover the ease of a gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances incl. dishwasher, formal lounge with built in surround sound, plus a spacious family/meals area. Fashionably styled with Tasmanian Oak polished floors, neutral tones and modern furnishings, there are 3 good sized bedrooms with built in robes.
The sparkling renovated bathroom also has a spa bath. Outdoors there's a paved, north-facing entertaining area, spacious and private lawn area for children to play, workshop, landscaped garden and even room for the chooks! Car buffs and tradies will love the huge carport, with room for 4 cars.
Extras include solar panels on the roof, ducted heating, air conditioning, alarm, loads of off street parking and a location that has transport, quality schools, shops and parks all close by.
Naiomi Bentley : 0404 036 044

Description:
Plans, Permits and a House!
Get ready to get started, plans and permits are approved and working drawings are completed. On offer is an original home, which stays and plans and permits for two town homes to be built at the rear of the existing dwelling. The individual floor plans use space brilliantly; the homes are both single storey and well designed with modern floor plans - unit 2 has 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and single lock up garage with outdoor paved entertaining area. Unit 3 has 3 bedrooms 2 bathrooms and double lock up garage with outdoor paved entertaining area. The state of the art kitchen overlooks meals area plus fantastic spacious living room. Both homes come complete with 6 star energy rating & 2000L water tanks
All the hard work has been done for you, so don't miss this rare opportunity and start building now. All this ideally located in close proximity to Eastfield Mall shops; close to transport, Eastfield Park, Tinternvale Primary, Tintern Girls Grammar, Dorset Primary and EastLink. If it's an easy lifestyle or investment that you're after, you won't want to miss this one!
Donna Walpole : 0421 997 827

Description:
Under Offer/Under Contract
Here's one for developers, investors and first home buyers! Recently renovated with a fresh coat of paint and polished timber floors, this conveniently located home offers spacious living on a large 851m2 allotment. The light and airy interior features a generous lounge/dining with garden views, functional kitchen/meals with fresh cabinetry, 3 good-sized carpeted bedrooms (2 with built-in robes), bright family bathroom and large laundry. The covered alfresco area overlooks spacious low maintenance gardens complete with garden shed and citrus trees - the perfect setting for relaxed outdoor entertaining. Additional features include ducted heating and a double carport with access to the rear garden. With such a substantial block and convenient location, there is development potential (STCA). With access via a service lane, only a few doors from the popular Merrindale shopping precinct, the Dandenong Ranges on your doorstep and easy access to the city, this home offers a world of possibilities. Be quick, arrange an inspection today!
